Our Mission

Embedding trust into every step of the journey

Esmia was funded on the belief that every device on a global level should carry a verifiable, tamper-proof story, used as a trust fundament to drive the circular economy and a more sustainable future. Unifying cutting edge Blockchain and distributed web3 solutions and Recommerce industry expertise to build a infrastructure that scale. We integrate with existing reverse and logistic systems, making adaptation seamless and invisible inside daily workflows. Esmia is creating the foundation for a circular economy that is not only more sustainable â€” but more valuable.

  1. Build a global infrastructure for device trust
  2. Integrate seamlessly with existing systems
  3. Drive the circular economy forward
